sentences.en: He is heavily built, but beginning to sag.
sentences.cn: 他体形健壮，但肌肉已经开始松弛。

sentences.en: His cheeks are beginning to sag.
If higher import barriers deny sales and income to foreign exporters, foreign national incomes may sag.
sentences.cn: 如果较高的进口壁垒使外国出口商失去销售额和收入, 外国的国民收入就会下降.

sentences.en: Mike's jovial face seemed to sag.
sentences.cn: 迈克那张高兴的脸似乎一沉.

sentences.en: Some of the tension Altman builds up starts to sag.
sentences.cn: 奥尔特曼制造的一些紧张氛围开始缓解。

sentences.en: The beam has begun to sag.
The branch sagged under the weight of the apples.
The cable sag caused by cable dead weight is vertical.
sentences.cn: 由钢索自重引起的垂度是竖向的.

sentences.en: The chair seat had a slight sag.
The pound continued to sag despite four interventions by the Bank of England.
sentences.cn: 尽管英格兰银行四次出手干预，英镑仍不改颓势。

sentences.en: The shelf was beginning to sag beneath the weight of the books upon it.
sentences.cn: 书架在书的重压下渐渐下弯.

sentences.en: The shirt's cuffs won't sag and lose their shape after washing.
sentences.cn: 这件衬衫的袖口洗后照样挺括，不变形。

sentences.en: The skin around my eyes is starting to sag.
sentences.cn: 我眼睛周围的皮肤开始下垂了。

sentences.en: The tent began to sag as the canvas became wet.
sentences.cn: 帐篷因帆布湿了中间有些下坠.

sentences.en: The tent began to sag under the weight of the rain.
sentences.cn: 雨水使得帐篷中间开始下坠。

sentences.en: We need to do something about the sag.
sentences.cn: 我们须把下沉的地方修整一下.

sentences.en: Your skin starts to sag as you get older.

trans.tran_cn: 松弛, 下陷, 下垂, (物价)下跌, 漂流
trans.tran_en: to hang down or bend in the middle, especially because of the weight of something

trans.tran_cn: 下垂，消沉，下跌，[航]漂向下风向
